authors: Bingxing Wang(The Little Moe New LLC)

sm2shim-desc: Extension that provides compatibility support for FlashMP3 and SoundManager2Button using SoundManager2
sm2shim-jsrequired: JavaScript is required to enable media playback.
sm2shim-audioFileUrlRequired: Each playlist item must contains at least file URL (audioFileUrl property).
sm2shim-invalidJson: The playlist specified is not a valid JSON string.
